metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41867 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability in OnionShare 2.3 before 2.4 allowsremote unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the full list of participantsof a non-public OnionShare node via the --chat feature.

criterions.comment: onionshare: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
